name: Kombi Hybrid Primaloft Adult Socks - Unisex
description: Get happy feet so you can spend more time on the slopes. These Primaloft® ski sock provide comfort and warmth for all-mountain winter activities. Mesh ventilation zones help with moisture management so your feet don't get damp.Primaloft® insulating yarns with merino wool that's certified to be Mulesed-free.Ski boot adapted cushioning on feet and shins for all day comfort.Mesh ventilation for maximum breathability and dryness.Movement support on arch and ankle allows the sock to move with you.Flat toe seams won’t irritate or rub.
